amendment.description: An amendment numbered 20 printed in House Report 118-142 to prohibit provision of gender transition procedures, including surgery or medication, through the Exceptional Family Member Program.
amendment.purpose: Amendment prohibits provision of gender transition procedures, including surgery or medication, through the Exceptional Family Member Program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A009) Agreed to by recorded vote: 222 - 210 (Roll no. 302).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Norman.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A009) Agreed to by recorded vote: 222 - 210 (Roll no. 302).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
